name: Diesel - Atonement - Atonement
additionalNotes: The Diesel Atonement is a limited-edition cigar that was created as an exclusive release for members of the Tobacconistâ€™s Association of America (TAA). The cigar features a leathery, oily, dark Ecuadorian Sumatra-seed wrapper that covers a Connecticut Broadleaf binder and a Nicaraguan filler. This is a bold, peppery smoke that is balanced by an underlying sweetness. The blend was developed by legendary cigar crafter AJ Fernandez. The cigars are handmade in Nicaragua at the Tabacalera Fernandez factory. The TAA is a group of the top tobacconists in the nation.
